reference.shortdesc: Teletype text is text that is displayed on a fixed-width display such as a teletype, text-only screen, or line printer.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the tt element is typically rendered in a monospaced font.
The teletype component is typically rendered in a monospaced font.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The tt element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.
